```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)

# Les inn DEMO som character
demo <- read_excel("DEMO_Ass1.xlsx", sheet = 2, col_types = "text") %>%
  clean_names()

# Les inn GDP som character
gdp <- read_excel("GDP_Ass1.xlsx", sheet = 2, col_types = "text") %>%
  clean_names()


```

```{r}
# DEMO
demo_long <- demo %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("x"),
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "population"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    year = as.integer(sub("x", "", year)),
    population = as.numeric(population)  # konverter til tall
  )

# GDP
gdp_long <- gdp %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("x"),
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "gdp"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    year = as.integer(sub("x", "", year)),
    gdp = as.numeric(gdp)
  )
```

```{r}
combined <- demo_long %>%
  inner_join(gdp_long, by = c("region", "year")) %>%
  mutate(
    gdp_per_capita = (gdp / population )* 1000000
  )
```
